item.title: Making people admin, and Command HELP NEEDED!
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“M4G3OWNS, post:10, topic:13732”]uh it cos ur compiler is rong xD you need the code
as below
@echo off
COLOR 08
title (wateva you want to call window)
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin/java.exe” server
pause ^ that 08 can be changed it depends on wat vs you hav[/quote]
WRONG!!!
You have to do the Javac tut. Look in the tut section. There’s a sticky for it! LOOK HARD!! MAN NOOBS DON’T LOOK AT STICKYS! Sorry for the caps but it’s really annoying.

item.title: Making people admin, and Command HELP NEEDED!
item.dc:creator: @M4G3OWNS M4G3OWNS
item.description:
@M4G3OWNS wrote:

uh it cos ur compiler is rong xD you need the code
as below
@echo off
COLOR 08
title (wateva you want to call window)
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin/java.exe” server
pause ^ that 08 can be changed it depends on wat vs you hav

item.title: Making people admin, and Command HELP NEEDED!
item.dc:creator: @safturento safturento
item.description:
@safturento wrote:

ok…i am using testscape…

first i need help with admin…

i go to client.java and search for

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

then i go to

[code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“safturento”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}[/code]

so you see that safturento and admin should have owner rights

then i go to characters and click on my name and give myself lvl 3 rights and save

i compile

i get on owner and he has the rights(HE ALWAYS HAS) but if i get on safturento he doesnt have any rights…

for commands i do everything it says in all of the tuts and then i go and use the commands and they dont work!!

[code]/END OF FRAME TESTING/
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pmodglow”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
pmodglow = true;
}

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminglow") && playerRights >= 2)
    {
           adglow = true;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ownerglow") && playerRights >= 3)
    {
           ownerglow = true;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pmodglowoff") && playerRights >= 1)
    {
           pmodglow =false;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminglowoff") && playerRights >= 2)
    {
           adglow = false;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ownerglowoff") && playerRights >= 3)
    {
           ownerglow = false;
    }

else if (command.startsWith(“testclue96f3t23t43v4g3”))
{
cluereward(4151, 1434, 3140, 4087, 1050, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1);
showInterface(8134);
}
else if (command.startsWith(“wowz”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“x91”))
{
int id = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
//stillgfx(id, absY, absX);
sendMessage(“Testing GrApHiCs cODE!!”);
}

else if (command.startsWith(“loadclue”))
{
//loadmoreinfo();
println_debug("cluelevel: "+cluelevel);
println_debug("cluestage: "+cluestage);
println_debug("clueid: "+clueid);
}

else if (command.startsWith(“male”))
{
sendMessage(“You’re now a man…”);
pHead=1;
pBeard=10;
pTorso=18;
pArms=26;
pHands=33;
pLegs=36;
pFeet=42;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if (command.startsWith(“female”))
{
sendMessage(“You’re now a girl…”);
pHead=50;
pTorso=57;
pArms=62;
pHands=68;
pLegs=72;
pFeet=80;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} [/code]

all of those work exept for the admin glow ones…

the only reason the others work is because THEY CAME WITH THE DAMN SOURCE!!!

WHAT…AM…I…DOING…WRONG!!![br][size=1]Posted at: September 10, 2006, 12:31:27 AM[/size][hr]13 views and no posts…and i thought you people were realy good at this shit lol

Read full topic
